title: The Auditors
overview: Nikki, grappling with post-job loss financial strain, inadvertently ignore the fine print of their MDPOPE purchase. Their descent into horror begins with the ominous arrival of The Auditor, who swiftly transports them away in a pet cage, subjecting them to brutal and agonizing torture. The nightmare intensifies when the protagonists realize their dreadful fate: being sold to another Auditor as mere pets.
